resources.string: How can I draw shapes?
Draw a shape by creating dots on the canvas. Suggestions will appear on the top panel. Select one suggestion to draw it on the canvas.
How can I select a shape?
Double-tap on a shape to select it. Its corners will become highlighted on selection.
How can I move a shape?
Simply drag a shape to move it anywhere you like.
What are the red, green and blue ribbons in the color chooser popup?
They are used to mix the color of the selected shape. Simply adjust each color by clicking anywhere on the corresponding ribbon. Click on Ok to apply the color to the shape after the mixing.
What are the options available after a shape is selected?
There are Zoom, Rotate, Delete Shape and Change Color options.
